title: Emerald Bloom & Polki Diamond Dangler: An Enchanting Karnaphool
materials: Polki Diamonds (Uncut Diamonds). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish. Each Emerald carefully selected for color and clarity.
features: Exquisite dangler earrings featuring a floral motif crafted with vivid green emeralds, surrounded by a delicate halo of Polki diamonds. The lower portion showcases a captivating Polki diamond, uniquely cut, encased in an oval frame accentuated with smaller diamonds. The open setting allows light to play through the stones, maximizing their brilliance. These earrings exemplify the masterful artistry of Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
occasions: and special celebrations. Adds a touch of elegance to traditional attire like sarees and lehengas. Ideal for evening events and functions (Subha karyalu).
description: A blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern design. These earrings showcase the rich heritage of Hyderabad's jewelry artistry. The Polki diamonds, known for their unique character, provide a distinct sparkle that complements the vibrant emeralds. A statement piece that exudes timeless elegance and sophistication (garima).
